law_name: THE SOUTH ASIAN STRATEGIC STABILITY INSTITUTE UNIVERSITY ISLAMABAD ACT

sections.body: (1) This Act may be called the South Asian Strategic Stability Institute University Islamabad Act, 2013. (2) It shall come into force at once.

In this Act, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or context, various definitions are provided for terms such as 'Academic Council', 'Authority', 'Affiliated institution', 'Board', 'Chancellor', 'College', 'Commission', 'Constituent college', 'Controller', 'Dean', 'Department', 'Director', 'Executive Committee', 'Faculty', 'Government', 'Institute', 'Officer', 'Patron', 'prescribed', 'Professor Emeritus', 'Principal', 'Registrar', 'Committee', 'Statutes', 'Trust', and 'University'.

sections.section_title: Establishment and incorporation of the University
sections.body: (1) There shall be established a University to be called as the South Asian Strategic Stability Institute University Islamabad, consisting of various members and bodies as specified. (2) The University shall be a body corporate with powers to acquire and hold property. (3) The principal seat of the University shall be at Islamabad. (4) The University shall have academic, financial and administrative autonomy. (5) The Government or an authority shall have no power to question the policy underlying the allocation of resources approved by the Board.

sections.section_title: Powers and purposes of the University
sections.body: The University shall have various powers including promoting knowledge, conducting research, determining courses, holding examinations, conferring degrees, and establishing affiliations with other institutions.

sections.section_title: University open to all classes, creeds, etc.
Appointment and removal of the Chancellor
Powers and functions of the Board of Governors
Powers and duties of the Executive Committee
Appointment of committees by certain authorities
Amendment and repeal of statutes and regulations
Commencement of term of members of authorities
Proceedings of authorities not invalidated by vacancies
